org.hkijena.jipipe.api.parameters

Annotation Type JIPipeContextAction


  • @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface JIPipeContextAction
    An additional action (usually UI action) that is attached to the ParameterPanel. Annotate a method with this annotation to make it accessible to the UI. Use JIPipeDocumentation to add additional information. The method should take a JIPipeWorkbench instance as parameter

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String iconDarkURL
      The icon resource URL (optional)
      String iconURL
      The icon resource URL (optional)
      Class<?> resourceClass
      The class that loads the resource
      boolean showInContextMenu
      Determines if the context action is shown in the context menu
      boolean showInParameters
      Determines if the context action is shown as button in the parameters

    • Element Detail

      • iconURL

        public abstract String iconURL
        The icon resource URL (optional)
        Returns:
        icon resource URL or empty
        Default:
        ""

      • iconDarkURL

        public abstract String iconDarkURL
        The icon resource URL (optional)
        Returns:
        icon resource URL or empty
        Default:
        ""

      • resourceClass

        public abstract Class<?> resourceClass
        The class that loads the resource
        Returns:
        the resource class
        Default:
        org.hkijena.jipipe.utils.ResourceUtils.class

      • showInParameters

        public abstract boolean showInParameters
        Determines if the context action is shown as button in the parameters
        Returns:
        if the action is shown in the parameters
        Default:
        true

      • showInContextMenu

        public abstract boolean showInContextMenu
        Determines if the context action is shown in the context menu
        Returns:
        if the action is shown in the context menu
        Default:
        true
